column4: Hello. I have set Pidgin and Skype to start on Startup Applications. First Pidgin and then Skype. But most of the times, Skype starts before Pidgin. Is there anything I can do to preserve the order I want?
I'm not sure you can but if you changed the priority of the programs, perhaps it would start the higher priority app first?
that's thought a thought, in theory
I have the priority I want but it doesn't work
